1.0.4: Add column indexes to ListColumns to correct ordering when rendering inspector.
1.2.2: CreateRows remove cells from error message.
1.2.5: CreateRows when a 'New column' is already in the Spreadsheet, it won't be created again.
1.2.6: Fixed the issue of column mismatch in CreateRow.
1.2.7: Updated the `ListColumns` to fetch only first row.
2.0.1: Replace the legacy scope of v3, https://spreadsheets.google.com/feeds, with the updated scope `auth/spreadsheets`. For read-only operations, is the `auth/spreadsheets.readonly` used as an alternative.
Migration steps: re-authenticate all Google spreadsheets components in your flows.
2.0.2: Updated the CreateRow action to append new row at the end of the spreadsheet, removing the need to fetch all range of rows.
2.1.0: Breaking Change: Updated the NewRow trigger to include a required input field, Index Column, used to monitor a specific column for detecting new rows in the spreadsheet.
